name: eosjs-ecc-rn
description: Elliptic curve cryptography functions - react native version
keywords: ECC, Private Key, Public Key, Signature, AES, Encryption, Decryption, React Native
author: gamexcoin

scripts.build: npm run build_lib && npm run build_browser
scripts.build_browser: mkdir -p lib && browserify -o lib/eosjs-ecc-rn.js -s eosjs_ecc_rn lib/index.js
scripts.build_browser_test: npm run build && browserify -o dist/test.js lib/*.test.js
scripts.docs: npm run documentation -- readme src/api_common.js --section "Common API" --shallow
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test_lib && npm run minimize && npm run docs && npm run srisum
